content.rendered:
Rates

$230 Initial Intake 60 minutes
$180 Individual Therapy Session 50 minutes

Insurance

I am not paneled with insurance companies and am considered an out-of-network provider. If your insurance company provides out-of-network reimbursement,  I can provide a detailed receipt each month. You can submit this to your insurance company if they provide partial or full reimbursement. 

This receipt, also called a superbill, includes my business information and a diagnosis.  If this is something you’re interested in, please speak with your insurance company about out-of-network costs for outpatient mental health services.

There are a few reasons why I do not accept insurance:

  • We can get started quickly. No need to wait for authorization from your insurance company.
  • Therapy can end when it feels right – not because additional sessions have not been authorized.
  • More confidentiality. Insurance companies have access to your diagnosis and can request additional records in order to justify treatment.

Payment

Payment is collected at the time of service via credit card.

Cancellation Policy

If you are unable to attend a session, please make sure you cancel at least 24 hours beforehand. Otherwise, you may be charged for the full rate of the session.

Any Other Questions

Please contact me with any additional questions you may have. I look forward to hearing from you!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Contact
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Please use the form on this page to send a message. You may also contact me by phone. Please know that contacting me does not establish a therapeutic relationship. Phone: Location Information My office is located near downtown St. Petersburg. If you are interested in working with me but not…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Free Consultation Request
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Please complete the form below to schedule a complimentary consultation. This 20-minute phone call is for me to learn more about your concerns and for you to learn about my approach and to ask any questions you may have. At the end, we can decide if we'd like to move…

jetpack-related-posts.title: FAQs
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: I’m used to handling things on my own. Does seeing a therapist make me seem weak? No! Everyone needs help or support now and then. In fact, I think it takes courage to ask for help. You already have strengths that you’ve used before, but for whatever reason may struggle…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Mental Health Links
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The following links are listed to provide you with additional online mental health care information. Please also check the additional links provided for physical health for a more comprehensive understanding of your overall well-being. The following is not meant to be a comprehensive list, nor is it an endorsement of the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Individual Therapy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Individual Therapy for Adults Our work together will be customized to meet your specific needs and goals. Whether you are struggling with anxiety, stress, relationship problems, or managing difficult life changes, I will help you recognize underlying problems, fully realize your strengths and adjust certain behaviors and thoughts to see…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Online Therapy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: My individual therapy services are also available online for Florida residents. Online therapy is convenient, effective, and confidential.
